The photograph is a Pulitzer Prize: winning image taken by UPI photographer Andrew Lopez in 1960.
The photograph does not depict a Cuban f: but rather a member of Batista's army who had been charged as a war criminal by the revolutionaries.
The UPI caption for the photograph state: Jose Cipriano Rodriguez, who was executed by firing squad after being found guilty of the deaths of two brothers.
The photograph: s details differ from the accompanying meme, which inaccurately portrays the circumstances and involvement of Ernesto "Che" Guevara in the case.
